content: प्रतीक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Directed or turned towards. {@--2@} Inverted, reverse. {@--3@} Contrary, unfavourable, adverse. --कः {@--1@} A limb, member; <ls>Śi. 18. 79.</ls> {@--2@} A part, portion. --कं {@--1@} An image. {@--2@} Mouth, face. {@--3@} The front (of anything). {@--4@} The first word (of a verse, sentence &c.).
